import plotly.figure_factory as ff

### Exploratory Data Analyis on Students Performance in Exam Using Plotly
source.a40f6967: ### 2. Some Basic Visualizations Using Bar Graphs and Pie Charts
source.7f0a63cb: > This notebook covers some of the basics of Pandas library such as simple statistics calculation and contingency tables. Moreover, notebook also covers some of the graphs which are required to plot for getting better understanding on the data. Plotly library is used for plotting the graphs.
